mapper.insert: insert into blog(title, content, createTime, modifyTime,digest) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime},#{digest})
mapper.select: select id,title,digest,createTime from blog order by createTime desc limit #{pageIndex},#{pageNum}
select id, title, content, createTime, modifyTime, digest from blog where id = #{blogId}
select id, title, content, createTime, modifyTime, digest from blog where id in (select blogId from blog_tag where tagId=#{tagId})
